e: ￹`O~ `ma~`misawad~ `kako~ `to~ `ma~`tiraay~ `a~ `tayal~.￺I am going to quit that kind of work.￻那種工作我將要辭掉
￹`O~ `pi~`sawad~ `iso~ `a~ `mitamako~ `ko~ `nga'ay~.￺You should quit smoking.￻你最好把香烟戒掉
￹`Mala~`sawad~ `to~ `ko~ `ni~`harateng~`an~ `ako~.￺I have given up that thinking.￻我已經放棄那種思想
￹`Ma~`palasawad~ `to~ `koya~ `niyaro'~.￺That village has ceased to exist.￻那個村落已成廢墟了
d.f: ￹￺to disappear * no longer exist￻失蹤，消失

e: ￹`Misa~`wad~ `kako~ `a~ `mi~`tilid~.￺1. I graduated from school.  2. I quit school.￻1. 我從學校畢業  2. 我離開學校
